titleStmt.title: A proclamation ordeined and made by the kinges highnes with the aduise of his most honourable counsaile, the .xxi. daye of Maye, in the .xxxvi. yere of his maiesties reygne, lymyttyng howe and at what pryces beefe mutton veale porke wyldefoule and other kyndes of vitailes shalbe solde.
Proclamations. 1544-05-21
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berth[elet] regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendu[m] solum,

notesStmt.note: First leaf only filmed on reel 10.
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
Appears at reels 10 and 152 (Society of Antiquaries copy).
